section.header: Inclusion of contracts and grants for residential care for veterans in exception to certain recapture requirements
section.text: Section 8136(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting , or the provision by the Secretary of a contract or grant for residential care for veterans, after outpatient clinic.
